mng: free reed mouth organ, with wooden pipes stuck into a gourd (larger version of 笙[sheng1])

exm.mng: lit. to play the yu 竽 mouth organ to make up numbers (idiom); fig. to make up the numbers with inferior products, to masquerade as having an ability, token member of a group
indiscriminately included in company (without any qualification), see 濫竽充數|滥竽充数[lan4 yu2 chong1 shu4]
player of the yu 竽 (free reed mouth organ)
